Package com.icegreen.greenmail.store

Interface Summary
FolderListener  
MailFolder Represents a mailbox within an Store.
MailMessageAttributes Interface for objects holding IMAP4rev1 Message Attributes.
Store Represents the complete mail store for an IMAP server, providing access to and manipulation of all Mailboxes stored on this server.
StoredMessage  
 

Class Summary
InMemoryStore A simple in-memory implementation of Store, used for testing and development.
MessageFlags The set of flags associated with a message.
SimpleMessageAttributes Attributes of a Message in IMAP4rev1 style.
SimpleStoredMessage A mail message with all of the extra stuff that IMAP requires.
 

Exception Summary
FolderException Thrown on an inappropriate attempt to reference a mailbox.
